entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low plus 2 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain changing to rain near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Low plus 2 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 60 in the evening then light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
